description: This Python module builds structured prompts for a brand copywriting application. It processes validated input data to create detailed prompt strings for an LLM, including platform-specific notes, style instructions, and brand information. The core function, `build_prompt`, assembles the prompt and associated metadata.

methods.name: str _join_nonempty(lines: list[str])
methods.description: Concatenates a list of strings, joining only non-empty and non-whitespace strings with newline characters.

methods.name: str _platform_notes(platform: str)
methods.description: Returns platform-specific prompt notes based on the platform string.

methods.name: str _orientation_notes(orientation: str)
methods.description: Returns orientation-specific instructions for content creation based on the orientation string.

methods.name: tuple[str,Dict[str,Any]] build_prompt(req: PromptGenerateRequest)
methods.description: Constructs a detailed prompt string and metadata dictionary from a validated request object, integrating brand, style, platform, orientation, and additional brief/context information.
